argument.name: drawing_code
argument.description: One or more Xbasic commands that modify the image. The command string begins with an starting string, such as <<%code%, and concludes with an ending string, such as %code%. Each command is on a separate line, starting with the line after <<%code%.

page.description: Draw directly to the screen or simply use the context to get metrics.
page.discussion: The UI_SCREEN_DRAW() function writes directly to the Windows display. It can be used to determine the size of a bitmap object that would be later printed. The function supports the same drawing code as UI_BITMAP_DRAW(). Limitations: Desktop applications only.
